data.oai_dc:dc: This is a gzip/tar compressed data archive containing the input and output files for the Variant Effect Predictor (VEP) related analyses. It also has a RepeatMasker results file, based on the sacCer3 reference genome, and a perl script "mask.repeatmasker.pl" to mask/exclude the VEP results
wine yeast domestication|comparative population genomics|microbe adaptive evolution|introgression|Divergent selection
